verses.text: And he \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* at his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* to \w resist|strong="H7853"\w* him.\f + \fr 3.1 \ft Satan: that is, an adversary\f*\f + \fr 3.1 \ft to…: Heb. to be his adversary\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* thee, O \w Satan|strong="H7854"\w*; even the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* thee: \add is\add* not this a \w brand|strong="H0181"\w* \w plucked|strong="H5337"\w* out of the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*?

Now \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* was \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w filthy|strong="H6674"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*.

And he \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto those that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w filthy|strong="H6674"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* from him. And unto him he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, I have caused thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* from thee, and I will \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* thee with change of \w raiment|strong="H4254"\w*.

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let them \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w fair|strong="H2889"\w* \w mitre|strong="H6797"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*. So they \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w fair|strong="H2889"\w* \w mitre|strong="H6797"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* him with \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*. And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* stood \w by|strong="H5975"\w*.
And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w protested|strong="H5749"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; If thou wilt \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and if thou wilt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, then thou shalt also \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* my \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and shalt also \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee places to \w walk|strong="H4108"\w* among these that stand \w by|strong="H5975"\w*.\f + \fr 3.7 \ft charge: or, ordinance\f*\f + \fr 3.7 \ft places…: Heb. walks\f*

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* now, O \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, thou, and thy \w fellows|strong="H7453"\w* that \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: for they \add are\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* wondered \w at|strong="H4159"\w*: for, behold, I will bring \w forth|strong="H0935"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* the \w BRANCH|strong="H6780"\w*.\f + \fr 3.8 \ft wondered…: Heb. of wonder, or, sign\f*

For behold the \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* that I have \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*; upon \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \add shall be\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: behold, I will \w engrave|strong="H6605"\w* the \w graving|strong="H6603"\w* thereof, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and I will \w remove|strong="H4185"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of that \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, shall ye \w call|strong="H7121"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* under the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* and under the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*.
